Title: [ANN] [PRE-ICO]‚ö°Ô∏èLionsea‚ö°Ô∏èBuy LST Get Airdrop Coin Listed on Bittrex or Binance!
Body: LIONSEA.io was born with a Mission ‚Äì Connecting the whole world by Transaction Processing Technology    WEBSITE     TOKEN     WHITEPAPER     ROADMAP     TWITTER     MEDIUM     TELEGRAM     FACEBOOK     FAQ  I. Blockchain 3.0 LSE:           LIONSEA makes a new tendency in Transaction Processing Technology, connects the cryptocurrency‚Äôs world to the traditional financial markets faster by the Blockchain 3.0 LSE platform.          LIONSEA deals with the big issues of the financial market, you can convert any Cryptocurrency together on the Blockchain 3.0 LSE platform.  II. Resolving the greatest issues:           1. TRANSACTIONS VELOCITY:          The number of users has grown strongly, which makes Bitcoin and many other cryptocurrency codes jammed and traded quite slowly.           2. TRANSACTION COSTS:          Transaction costs for financial services are very expensive, which limits many users approaching.           3. OPERATION MODEL:          The complicated operation model leads to only a few of them supplying transaction services.           4. THE MARKET LACKS COHESION:          The cohesion between the cryptocurrency market and the traditional financial market is limited by the complicated operation model.           5. CONNECTION:          The connection between cryptocurrency is not strong yet because there is no integrated blockchain platform.  III. E-Wallet & Online transaction:           A Mobile App that is convenient for users to manage and exchange all altcoins.          The online transaction platform allows to exchange LIONSEA with all the big altcoins and easily to take liquidity in any country.  IV. Debit card:           The next-generation debit card allows you to purchase commodity anywhere using BTC or any other codes.          All transactions are immediate, help save much time to convert between cryptographic codes to traditional fiat currencies.  V. Artificial intelligence:           Operations management with the artificial intelligence helps the customers experiencing the service perfectly  VI. LST token allocation chart:           - 50% for Pre-sales & ICO.          - 7% for Marketing & Bonus.          - 10% for Founder & Team.          - 5% for Advisors.          - 12% for Partners Reserve.          - 16% for Building Technology Foundation.
